text:
Yes, the digital license on a device moves forward to the current installed
Win10/11 os on that same upgraded device. i.e. as you noted...only
install/reinstall the current Win10/11 os on the same machine/hardware. I'm
still seeing some consumers running Windows 7 on pre-CY2015 devices that never
upgraded to Win10 now looking for Windows 10 devices and/or asking where to buy
Windows 10 retail/OEM software instead of replacing the device with Window 11.
Also some, asking about reverting a new Win11 device(OEM or BYO) to Windows 10.
- unfortunately, my sympathy and willingness to counsel those folks is waning
very quickly. ...w

metadata.topic: Win 7 no longer upgrading to Win10 - no more reinstalling PCs

metadata.email_text_original:
Win 7 no longer upgrading to Win10 - no more reinstalling PCs 
Yes, the digital license on a device moves forward to the current installed
Win10/11 os on that same upgraded device. i.e. as you noted...only
install/reinstall the current Win10/11 os on the same machine/hardware. I'm
still seeing some consumers running Windows 7 on pre-CY2015 devices that never
upgraded to Win10 now looking for Windows 10 devices and/or asking where to buy
Windows 10 retail/OEM software instead of replacing the device with Window 11.
Also some, asking about reverting a new Win11 device(OEM or BYO) to Windows 10.
- unfortunately, my sympathy and willingness to counsel those folks is waning
very quickly. ...w -----Original Message----- From:
patchmanagement@googlegroups.com On Behalf Of Abbodii Sent: Wednesday, October
25, 2023 11:38 PM To: patchmanagement@googlegroups.com Subject: Re:
[patchmanagement] Win 7 no longer upgrading to Win10 - no more reinstalling PCs
If you already had Digital License (AKA Hardware ID activation) due upgrading
from Windows 7/8/8.1 or using genuine Windows 7/8/8.1 key, it will continue to
work whenever you reinstall Windows 10/11 on the same machine/hardware however,
since September 26 2023, if you perform new upgrade from Windows 7/8/8.1 or used
Windows 7/8/8.1 key to activate Windows 10/11, it will not work or grant new
Digital License On 10/26/23, Winston Natoli wrote:
Link: None
metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] Win 7 no longer upgrading to Win10 - no more reinstalling PCs
metadata.noun_chunks: ['the digital license', 'the current installed Win10/11', 'Windows 10 devices', 'a new Win11 device(OEM']
